item.title: Tori add a quote by Sharon G. Flake
item.description: "Gotta realize that all you are is all you got." -- Sharon G. Flake

item.title: Tori add a quote by Laurie Halse Anderson
item.description: "Everybody told me to be a man. Nobody told me how." -- Laurie Halse Anderson

item.title: Tori add a quote by Todd Strasser
item.description: "The story you are about to read is a work of fiction. Nothing - and everything - about it is real." -- Todd Strasser

item.title: Tori add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "You cannot do a kindness too soon, for you never know how soon it will be too late." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Tori add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "If you cannot read all your books...fondle them---peer into them, let them fall open where they will, read from the first sentence that arrests the eye, set them back on the shelves with your own hands, arrange them on your own plan so that you at least know where they are. Let them be your friends; let them, at any rate, be your acquaintances." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Tori add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Tori add a quote by Ursula K. Le Guin
item.description: "Love doesn't just sit there, like a stone, it has to be made, like bread; remade all the time, made new." -- Ursula K. Le Guin

item.title: Tori add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "When someone shows you who they are believe them; the first time." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Tori add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "I'm not young enough to know everything." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Tori add a quote by Katherine Anne Porter
item.description: "The past is never where you think you left it." -- Katherine Anne Porter

item.title: Tori add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Tori add a quote by John Green
item.description: "As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once." -- John Green

item.title: Tori add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Tori add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "You donâ€™t forget the face of the person who was your last hope." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Tori add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that." -- Stephen King

item.title: Tori add a quote by John Green
item.description: "What a slut time is. She screws everybody." -- John Green

item.title: Tori add a quote by Alice Hoffman
item.description: "Books may well be the only true magic." -- Alice Hoffman

item.title: Tori add a quote by John Green
item.description: "The marks humans leave are too often scars." -- John Green
